coreAtributes.name: Tail Sleeve
coreAtributes.description: A specialized piece of armour, designed to protect the wearer's tail from physical harm. Consists of a layer of plates, over a layer of mail, over a sleeve of thick, quilted cloth. Enchanted to fit any tail, and inexplicably multiplies to adorn multiple tails on the same wearer.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unfasten and remove your Tail Sleeve.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unfasten and remove [npc.name]'s Tail Sleeve.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear [npc.name]'s Tail Sleeve from their tail.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] unfastens and removes their Tail Sleeve.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] unfastens and removes your Tail Sleeve.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears your Tail Sleeve from your tail.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] tears [npc2.name]'s Tail Sleeve from their tail.

replacementText.playerSelf: You fasten your Tail Sleeve to your tail.
replacementText.playerNPC: You fasten [npc.name]'s Tail Sleeve to their tail.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You pin [npc.name]'s wriggling tail in place, and fasten their Tail Sleeve to it.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] fastens their Tail Sleeve to their tail.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] fastens your Tail Sleeve to your tail.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] pins your wriggling tail in place, and fastens your Tail Sleeve to it.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] fastens [npc2.name]'s Tail Sleeve to their tail.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] pins [npc2.name]'s wriggling tail in place, and fastens their Tail Sleeve to it.
